name: Corpse Climber
description:
This is the result of nearly a month of work. The game is not finished, it is merely a proof of concept for the design and the mechanics. I don't know if I'll ever finish it but it will be updated in the future nonetheless. It cointains no graphics and some poor sound design, it was mostly a coding exercise. However, I do think the gameplay is quite enjoyable.

Please, leave some feedback:
https://forms.gle/bptCLV9f5mtMSdtS9
